item.description: There is snow up north. I am open to either Moosilauke or Bretton Woods Ski area. Moosilauke has ungroomed ski trails surrounded by beautiful mountains. We can do two short trips with lunch in between or one longer trip. You would need a day pack with headlamp water and snacks.

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: Cross Country Ski
